turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a grande americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me order that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My order is not done yet.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what else would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add almond milk and honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, caffe americano's are typically served hot, do you still want to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll add that, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caffe americano with almond milk and whipped cream, to be picked up at the starbucks in cleveland heights.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 6 minutes.
